amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress that the President should take immediate steps to establish a plan to address the military and economic development of China.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2535 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2535 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12782-12783) To express the sense of Congress that the President should take immediate steps to establish a plan to address the military and economic development of China.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2535 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2535 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe.
